Package net.coobird.thumbnailator

This package contains classes which provide the core functionalities of Thumbnailator.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Position This interface is implemented by classes which calculate how to position an object inside of an enclosing object.
 

Class Summary
BufferedImages This class provides convenience methods for using BufferedImages.
Coordinate This class calculates the position of an image which is to be enclosed, using an absolute coordinate at which the image should be located.
Rename This class is used to rename file names.
Thumbnailator This class provides static utility methods which perform generation of thumbnails using Thumbnailator.
ThumbnailParameter This class is used to specify the parameters to use when creating a thumbnail.
Thumbnails This class provides a fluent interface to create thumbnails.
Thumbnails.Builder A builder interface for Thumbnailator.
Thumbnails.Rename Deprecated. This class has been moved to the Rename class, and is subject to removal in future versions of Thumbnailator.
 

Enum Summary
Positions An enum of predefined Positions.
 

Package net.coobird.thumbnailator Description

This package contains classes which provide the core functionalities of Thumbnailator.
